rows.label: qst104707_msg001
rows.name: Everyone, calm down...

rows.label: qst104707_msg0001
rows.name:
There are more people than we were
told! What's the meaning of this?

rows.label: qst104707_msg0002
rows.name:
The number of people wishing
to board increased just
before departure...

rows.label: qst104707_msg0003
rows.name:
What? You're talking
as if it's our fault.

rows.label: qst104707_msg0004
rows.name:
Didn't you say that the people
of Torigo would accept them,
even if there were a few more?

rows.label: qst104707_msg0005
rows.name:
Yes... The people of
Torigo are kind, so...

rows.label: qst104707_msg0006
rows.name:
You're one of those who got
scouted and became a Driver?

rows.label: qst104707_msg0007
rows.name:
You gave up on this town
and became a lackey of
the Empire, didn't you?

rows.label: qst104707_msg0008
rows.name:
You know how much we've suffered
because of their country, and yet...

rows.label: qst104707_msg0009
rows.name:
This just means more mouths
to feed. We'll starve!

rows.label: qst104707_msg0010
rows.name: That's not...

rows.label: qst104707_msg0011
rows.name:
Hmph! To belittle one's
own people. As expected
of the foolish masses...

rows.label: qst104707_msg0012
rows.name: What did you say, you bastard!

rows.label: qst104707_msg0013
rows.name:
Hey, Dori! I can't forgive
these guys for coming to
live on our Divine Beast!

rows.label: qst104707_msg0014
rows.name: C-Calm down...

rows.label: qst104707_msg0015
rows.name: Whose side are you on?

rows.label: qst104707_msg0016
rows.name: Um, well... Please stop fighting...

rows.label: qst104707_msg0017
rows.name: Who do you think started this fight?

rows.label: qst104707_msg0018
rows.name:
Unable to even fulfill your
role as an intermediary...
You useless Driver.

rows.label: qst104707_msg0019
rows.name: Excuse me, but Orca is not at fault!

rows.label: qst104707_msg0020
rows.name:
Hmph, a beast-type Blade... So you've
resonated with something of low value
and think you're one of the Empire now.

rows.label: qst104707_msg0021
rows.name: How awful...

rows.label: qst104707_msg0022
rows.name: I will not let that remark pass...

rows.label: qst104707_msg0023
rows.name: Byakko-san!

rows.label: qst104707_msg0024
rows.name: To insult them is to insult us.

rows.label: qst104707_msg0025
rows.name:
I was planning to step in if someone
was about to get hurt, but...

rows.label: qst104707_msg0026
rows.name:
...even my usually calm self
cannot remain silent any longer!

rows.label: qst104707_msg0027
rows.name:
I shall use my water to
cool all of your heads!!

rows.label: qst104707_msg0028
rows.name:
Maybe my water powers will
help you cool off a little!
